column4: Open up your GNOME menu, select Preferences followed by Sessions. Switch to the Startup programs tab
Anyone knows a perl scripts for reading logs, like loco?
don't know loco, what do you need?
just colored easy on the eyes logs.
loco colors the logs as in tail - /var/log/syslog  | loco but not good enough
i see, well i don't know any tool for that, but it should'nt be easy to write
true, but I'm too new to write even my name :/

Like 'root' should be red 'user' white 'date' green ..etc nothing major.
